name: Shadow of Krampus
description:
It's Christmas at the north pole... but things aren't quite as merry as they should be. 

Welcome to the North Pole, where you are... an ELF! You're working extra hard to save the kidnapped elves from the dark demon, Krampus. You will travel south of the North Pole into Krampus' dark lands and eliminate his dark elves yourself. Equipped with an arsenal of guns, a bow, and traps you will fight through Krampus' minions and rescue the elves just in time for Christmas. However, I don't think Krampus is going to let you take them back so easily...

Shadow of Krampus Features:

An arsenal including a stealthy bow, bear traps, a pistol, and a high damage rifle

Ammo crafting

Resource gathering

Wall climbing and a glider to traverse the North Pole

A thrilling 30 minute experience

Four maps filled with combat, puzzles, and exploration

Five different enemy types with different combat patterns
